text: Idaho State University is a public university in Pocatello, Idaho. The university has about 15,553 students. It was founded in 1901. The current president of the university is Robert W. Wagner. ==Sports== The men's athletics teams of the university are called the Bengals. They have 15 varsity teams and they compete in the Big Sky Conference. ==Other websites== *Idaho State University's Official website *Idaho State Bengals' Official athletics website Category:Big Sky Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Idaho Category:1901 establishments in the United States Category:1900s establishments in Idaho
title: Idaho State University
